extends java.lang.Object
    A static delegation for all user related operations

      • findAppKeyByTitleInBackground

        public void findAppKeyByTitleInBackground(Context context,
                                 java.lang.String appTitle,
                                 com.easemob.user.callbacks.FindAppKeyByAppTitleCallBack callBack)
        find appkey by app title
        Parameters:
        appTitle - The app title. Will look up the appkey based on app title.
        FindAppKeyByAppTitleCallBack - callback to be called when the server returns.
        Throws:
        EMServiceNotReadyException - If the EMService is not ready. This can happen when EMService has not been properly initialized.
        EMNetworkUnconnectedException - If the network is unconnected.
        EaseMobException - Other exceptions

              com.easemob.user.callbacks.GenericCallBack deleteAccountCallBack)

        Parameters:

      • getUser

        public EMUser getUser(java.lang.String userName)
               throws EaseMobException
        Get specified user. This method makes a request to the remote server, blocks until the response gets back. Typically, you should use getContactInBackground instead of this, unless you are managing your own threading.
        Parameters:
        userName - the userName, the primary key on User Server
        Returns:
        EMUserBase the EMUserBase. Note, you can convert the generic EMUserBase to your app specific User type by MyUser myUser = user.toType(MyUser.getClass());
        Throws:
        EMNetworkUnconnectedException - If the network is unconnected.
        EaseMobException - Other exceptions

      • getContacts

        public java.util.List<EMUser> getContacts(java.lang.String[] userIdList)
                                   throws EaseMobException
        Get all contacts. This method makes a request to the remote server, blocks until the response gets back. Typically, you should use getContactsInBackground instead of this, unless you are managing your own threading.
        Returns:
        contacts a list of all contacts
        Throws:
        EMServiceNotReadyException - If the EMService is not ready. This can happen when EMService has not been properly initialized.
        EMNetworkUnconnectedException - If the network is unconnected.
        EaseMobException - Other exceptions

      • getContactInBackground

        public void getContactInBackground(java.lang.String userName,
                          com.easemob.user.callbacks.GetContactCallback getContactCallback)
        Get specified contact.
        Parameters:
        userName - the user name. This name must be unique across the whole app.
        getContactsCallback - The callback to be called when the server returns. may execute in a separate thread

      • updateContactInBackground

        public void updateContactInBackground(org.usergrid.java.client.entities.User user,
                             com.easemob.user.callbacks.UpdateAccountCallBack updateAccountCallBack)
        Update contact. This is for updating currently logged in user, i.e., myself.
        Parameters:
        contact - The contact Restrictions on avator: The image should be smaller than 8 kilobytes The image height and width should be between 32 and 96 pixels; the recommended size is 64 by 64 pixels. The image should be square. The image should be in either PNG, GIF, or JPEG format.
        Throws:
        EMServiceNotReadyException - If the EMService is not ready. This can happen when EMService has not been properly initialized.
        EMNetworkUnconnectedException - If the network is unconnected.
        EaseMobException - Other exceptions

        public java.util.List<EMUser> getContactsNearby(double latitude,
                                       double longitude,
                                       int within,
                                       int lastShowUpTime)
                                         throws EaseMobException
        Get contacts nearby.
        Parameters:
        latitude -
        longitude -
        within - in meters
        lastShowUpTime. - in hours. eg 48hours.
        Returns:
        List the EMUserBase. Note, you can convert the generic EMUserBase to your app specific User type by MyUser myUser = user.toType(MyUser.getClass());
        Throws:
        EMServiceNotReadyException - If the EMService is not ready. This can happen when EMService has not been properly initialized.
        EMNetworkUnconnectedException - If the network is unconnected.
        EaseMobException - Other exceptions

      • generateJid

        public static java.lang.String generateJid(java.lang.String appkey,
                           java.lang.String userName)
        Generate JID
        Parameters:
        appkey: - appkey. eg "100046"
        userName: - userName. This is the primary key that uniquely identify a user within an app on User server. eg "jliu"
        Returns:
        jid: full jid. For example, 100046_jliu@ac2

      • generateBareJid

        public static java.lang.String generateBareJid(java.lang.String appkey,
                               java.lang.String userName)
        Generate Bare JID
        Parameters:
        appkey: - appkey. eg "qixin" or "123456"
        userName: - userName. This is the primary key that uniquely identify a user within an app on User server. eg "jliu"
        Returns:
        jid: bare jid, ie, without the suffix of @ac2. For example, qixin_jliu

      • convertJIDToUserName

        public static java.lang.String convertJIDToUserName(java.lang.String jid)
        Convert bare jid (which is the primary key on XMPP server) to username (which is the primary key on User server). Bare JID format: appkey_username@ac2 UserName format: username
